name: Markus Stetter
body:
### Welcome to my page

I am a Phd student, programmer and amaranth breeder. Here I would like to give you some insights into my different projects.


### Science

Science is my first passion. 

### Programming

PhenoType is my first large programming project.



### Amaranth breeding and domestication

In my free time grow and breed amaranth with the long term (50 years or so) goal to domesticate amaranth.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
